as a user i want to be a part of a tight-knit community of creatives that share their knowledge, feedback and there is a standard of quality. Not everybody is a part of this community.. it is only for professionals.

as a user I want to find aspects and patterns of my work that I didnt even see and other people do.

as a user i want to know how much reach my work is having in the industry so i can measure my success and have a base to make decisions regarding my work, what is working, what are people liking about my work

as an admin i want to make an app that grows by itself, takes input from the industry and develps according to the industry. the industry is the one in charge of approving or rejecting input from other usersit collaborates by generating input, i learn and others learn and it is like one big creativity wiki

checkItems.name: The motif itself cannot be edited, but it can be deleted from a video
The user will be able to change their email, name, or password.
Videos will need a minimum of: description 300 characters, three motif posts, three credits
The curator will be able to create a new motif as a child of another motif.
case-insenstive
The videos will have motif counts on them.
The user will be able to enter search text for a motifs name

If the search text matches multiple motifs these motifs will appear as autocomplete options.  The motifs that are a sub-motif of motifs that match the search terms exactly are shown first, if there are any.
If the user presses return and an autocomplete option is selected then that motif is set as the current search term and the autocomplete options are updated
No autocomplete options are selected by default
The user can navigate autocomplete options by using the up and down arrow keys
If the user presses return and the search text is a just partial match then the search text becomes a keyword filter (full text search)
If the user presses return and the search term is a motif then the motif is added to the search filters
The curator will be able to select a source motif to merge into a target motif.
The source motif is removed after it is merged
The target motif gains all of the source motif's children.
The target's title and description remain the same.
The user will be able to add motifs to the current video search filter.
The user will be able to remove motifs from the current video search filter.
The user will be able to select a motif using the autocomplete mechanism.
The system will display videos which contain those motifs, or whose motifs are a sub-motif of the searched motif.
The user will be required to enter their email address
The user will be required to enter their name
The user will be required to enter a password & confirmation
The user can click on a motif's timestamp to highlight the motif's corresponding diamond in the timeline.
Clicking on the top level motifs will toggle them open or closed.
Clicking on a submotif makes the description editable.
to autocomplete with the users name, like Facebook tagging
if the user does not exist, we should be able to add an email where they are prompted to create an account
If the user exists, they are notified that they have been credited
bad description
Video doesnt follow guidelines
Add, edit and delete Credit fields
only the user who added the motif post and admins can delete a motif post
only the actual person/team and admins can delete a credit
Only the user who added the video and admins can edit description and transcript
assign parameters (500 motif likes received)
add a badge name
Delete/edit
